problemStatement.formal: \text{Relativization: } \exists A, B. P^A = NP^A \land P^B \neq NP^B
problemStatement.plain: Formalize the three major barriers to proving P â‰  NP: relativization (Baker-Gill-Solovay), natural proofs (Razborov-Rudich), and algebrization (Aaronson-Wigderson).

currentState.focus: Extending complexity class formalization with PSPACE, EXP, and NP-completeness framework.
currentState.activeApproach: Abstract complexity class definitions with barrier theorems.
currentState.nextAction: Add coNP, PSPACE-completeness, and explore removing sorries.
